Package ca.concordia.risk.game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
ca.concordia.risk.game.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the representation of the game player.
Author:
Enrique

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Player​(java.lang.String p_name)
    Creates a new player with a default human strategy.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String p_name)
      Creates a new player with a default human strategy.
      Parameters:
      p_name - name of the player to create.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the player.
      Returns:
      player name.

    • GetStrategy

      public PlayerStrategy GetStrategy()
      Gets the current player strategy.
      Returns:
      strategy currently used by the player.

    • SetStrategy

      public void SetStrategy​(PlayerStrategy p_strategy)
      Sets the current player strategy to a new strategy.
      Parameters:
      p_strategy - new strategy to adopt.

    • addCountry

      public void addCountry​(Country p_country)
      Adds a country to the list of countries owned by the player.
      Parameters:
      p_country - country to add to the list of owned countries.

    • removeCountry

      public void removeCountry​(Country p_country)
      Removes a country from the list of countries owned by the player.
      Parameters:
      p_country - country to remove from the list of owned countries.

    • ownsCountry

      public boolean ownsCountry​(Country p_country)
      Checks if the players owns a country.
      Parameters:
      p_country - country to check if it is owned by the player.
      Returns:
      true is the country is owned by the player.
      false otherwise.

    • getCountries

      public java.util.Set<Country> getCountries()
      Gets the set of countries that are owned by the player.
      Returns:
      set of countries that are owned by the player.

    • getEarnedCard

      public boolean getEarnedCard()
      Gets the flag signifying if this player earned a card that hasn't been issued yet.
      Returns:
      true if the player earned a card.
      false if the player hasn't earned a card.

    • setEarnedCard

      public void setEarnedCard​(boolean p_value)
      Sets the flag signifying if this player earned a card that hasn't been issued yet.
      Parameters:
      p_value - flag value to set.

    • getCards

      public java.util.Collection<Card> getCards()
      Gets the collection of cards the player currently possesses.
      Returns:
      collection of owned cards.

    • addActiveNegotiation

      public void addActiveNegotiation​(Player p_player)
      Adds a player to the set of players negotiated with.
      Parameters:
      p_player - player negotiated with.

    • isNegotiating

      public boolean isNegotiating​(Player p_player)
      Gets the flag signifying if this player is negotiating with a given player.
      Parameters:
      p_player - player to check negotiation status for.
      Returns:
      true if currently negotiating with with target player.
      false otherwise.

    • clearActiveNegotiations

      public void clearActiveNegotiations()
      Clears all active negotiations.

    • issueOrder

      public void issueOrder()
      Issues one player order and adds it to the order queue of the player.

      Uses the currently active player strategy to issue the order.

    • nextOrder

      public Order nextOrder()
      Gets the first order in the order queue of the player. The order is removed from the queue.
      Returns:
      Order if there is an order in the queue.
      null if the queue is empty.

    • peekLastOrder

      public Order peekLastOrder()
      Gets the last order in the order queue of the player without removing it from the queue.
      Returns:
      Order last order in the player's queue.
      null if the queue is empty.

    • getFinishedIssuingOrders

      public boolean getFinishedIssuingOrders()
      Gets the flag signifying if the player finished issuing orders for the current turn.
      Returns:
      true if the player finished issuing orders.
      false otherwise.

    • setFinishedIssuingOrder

      public void setFinishedIssuingOrder​(boolean p_value)
      Set the flag signifying if the player finished issuing orders for the current turn.
      Parameters:
      p_value - value of the flag to set.

    • getRemainingReinforcements

      public int getRemainingReinforcements()
      Gets the number of reinforcements the player has left.
      Returns:
      number of remaining reinforcements.

    • retrieveReinforcements

      public boolean retrieveReinforcements​(int p_numReinforcements)
      Retrieves requested number of reinforcements from the player if available.

      If successful, reduces the number of available reinforcements by the amount retrieved.

      Parameters:
      p_numReinforcements - number of reinforcements to retrieve.
      Returns:
      true if reinforcements were successfully retrieved.
      false if the requested number of reinforcements is invalid or the player did not have enough reinforcements.

    • getOwnedContinents

      public java.util.Set<Continent> getOwnedContinents()
      This method computes the set of continents that are fully captured by the player.
      Returns:
      set of continents that are fully captured by the player.

    • assignReinfocements

      public void assignReinfocements()
      Assigns reinforcements to the player.

      Reinforcements are assigned based on the minimum reinforcement number, number of countries owned and bonus value of wholly owned continents.

    • addCard

      public void addCard​(Card p_card)
      This method adds the card to the list of cards owned by the Player.
      Parameters:
      p_card - card to be added.

    • useCard

      public boolean useCard​(Card p_card)
      This method attempts to pick a specific type of Card from the list of Cards owned by the Player.

      If card of the target type is found in the player deck, it is removed from the deck.

      Parameters:
      p_card - card of the type to be picked.
      Returns:
      true if the card of the required type was in the player deck and was picked successfully.
      false if the card was not found in the player deck and thus could not be used.
